segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating such a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on the stool, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, stretching as high as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing nearby, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and the woman is completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get away with sneaking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so chaotic, with water everywhere and kids climbing on stools.
segments.speaker: PAR
